summary: This code is for a debug tool that analyzes slow code blocks, displaying the percentage of execution time they take up in the overall system. It supports counting read/write DB operations, total time consumption, average time consumption, and showing results in a TableView format.

details.comment: This code is for a debug tool that analyzes slow code blocks, displaying the percentage of execution time they take up in the overall system. It supports counting read/write DB operations, total time consumption, average time consumption, and showing results in a TableView format.
